title: Smart Data Models - PowerSystemStabilizerDynamics
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Power system stabilizer function block whose behaviour is described by reference to a standard model

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PowerSystemStabilizerDynamics

ExcitationSystemDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation system model with which this power system stabilizer model is associated. Default: None

RemoteInputSignal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Remote input signal used by this power system stabilizer model. Default: 'list'
